meanings.definition: The quality or state of being imperishable.
meanings.sent1: The imperishabilities of diamonds make them highly valuable and long-lasting.
meanings.sent2: She collected various imperishabilities like ancient artifacts and rare books.
meanings.sent3: The museum curator joked that the imperishabilities in the exhibit would outlast even the staff's lunch breaks.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was an imperishability that time could never fade.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the phoenix symbolizes the imperishabilities of rebirth and renewal.
